physical_quantity: Measures the combined effect of ionic size mismatch and charge imbalance between A-site and B-site cations relative to the anion size, reflecting geometric and electrostatic compatibility
why_it_matters: Stability of perovskites depends on how well the sizes and charges of A, B, and B′ cations fit around the anion framework without causing excessive distortion; this CV captures both size and charge mismatch in a single scalar that generalizes across oxides and halides
definition: CV = | (nA * rA) - 0.5 * (nB * rB + nB′ * rB′) | / rX
